title: wiki: iOS framework guide is outdated
body:
Go Mobile iOS framework tutorial [1] contains an outdated screenshot where the framework header is imported via "hello/Hello.h". `gomobile bind` currently outputs framework bundles with the capitalized name and the import directive must be replaced with

```
#import <Hello/Hello.h>
```

[1] https://github.com/golang/go/wiki/Mobile#building-and-deploying-to-ios-1
